scripts.android:clean: cd android/ && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-*
scripts.android:build-legacy: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease -x bundleReleaseJsAndAssets && cd ..
scripts.android:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.ios: cd ios && pod install && cd .. && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 6s'
